Title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in typolinks
Description: All link fields within the TYPO3 installation are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting as authorized editors can insert data commands by using the url scheme "data:".
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.26, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.10, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.2.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.26 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.10 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.2.1
